Kris | 26 | Marvel (Irondad) |
 I write Irondad fics - My AO3 is also baloobird | Harry Potter | Other Nerdy Things | Just a gal who still doesn't know how life works | The header image isn't my creation, but I wish it was.

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

summary: The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Christmassers
title: The Avengers: Earth's Mightiest Christmassers
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2KHzdIF

by raebands

Ever wonder what Christmas is like at Avengers Tower? If so, you should read this. They lead very interesting lives, those Avengers…

Words: 2275, Chapters: 1/3, Language: English

Series: Part 7 of Avengers: Earth’s Mightiest…

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Norse Religion & Lore
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Clint Barton, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Steve Rogers, Loki (Marvel), Thor (Marvel), Sigyn (Norse Religion & Lore), Hel | Hela (Norse Religion & Lore), Narfi (Norse Religion & Lore), Váli (Norse Religion & Lore), Bruce Banner, Tony Stark, Pepper Potts, Jane Foster (Marvel), Darcy Lewis, Phil Coulson, Maria Hill, Nick Fury
  • Relationships: Pepper Potts/Tony Stark, Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov, Loki/Sigyn (Marvel), Jane Foster/Thor
  • Additional Tags: Fluff and Crack, Family Fluff, Steve has a crush on Darcy, They’re almost a relationship

blog.name: doctorstrangeaskblog
blog.title: Ask Doctor Strange
blog.description: Parody motivational fan made roleplay "ask blog" style for the fictional Marvel character Stephen Strange, the sassiest magician of the cosmos, NOT A DOCTOR. I DO NOT rp any innapropriate content with minors and I'll REPORT anyone I see doing so. No profit, just for fun, I'm not affiliated to Marvel or anyone, just fan made. Follow me on Twitter @drstrangefanask

summary:
Wong: What did you give him?
Tony: Just some wine. Why?
Stephen: *spreading robes* Wanna smash?
body:
Wong: What did you give him?

Tony: Just some wine. Why?

Stephen: *spreading robes* Wanna smash?

summary: Concept: Tony Stark building the Avengers Compound with all new Clint Sized Vents that have an Intense security system to make...
body: Concept: Tony Stark building the Avengers Compound with all new Clint Sized Vents that have an Intense security system to make sure no one else can enter without authorization, both for security reasons and for Clint Reasons, whatever those may be.

blog.name: daughter-of-stark
blog.title: Suffering from Traumatic Endgame Brain Injury
blog.description:
""Everywhere I go, I see his face...""
--REQUESTS ARE OPEN--
Piper | 20 | Depressed | Writer | Artist | Bulgaria | Daughter of Tony Stark {obviously}  

MASTERLIST -  https://daughter-of-stark.tumblr.com/post/185570369887/masterlist

summary: Ok...so... I heard that the actress who plays Morgan Stark - Lexi Rabe - is currently being bullied. What for? I mean, I was...
body:
Ok…so… I heard that the actress who plays Morgan Stark - Lexi Rabe - is currently being bullied. What for? I mean, I was shocked as well when I learned. Still am. Why would someone bully a 7 year old little girl? Well, apparently for being part of the MCU. For bad acting. For “"being shoved down fans’ throats as the next Iron Man by Marvel and Disney”“ and all that crap I don’t give a fuck about. What I do give a fuck about, is that this little girl has no part in this. She probably doesn’t understand half the things that are going on, yet she is being bullied by kids and adults alike? Are you stupid? Like, seriously? You bully a child because she is not an award-winning actress? By the way, her performance in Endgame was brilliant in my opinion. She displayed this cute, sweet, shy little girl and I fell in love with her and her interaction with Tony.

I’m honestly sick and tired with this whole bullying deal. Something must be done and it must be done NOW. I don’t want another innocent, pure child to be fucked up by social media and some immature, dumb assholes. Spread the message and help. Put a stop to this before it’s too late. ⚠️⚠️⚠️

Help out on Instagram too~

.

.

.

summary: Imagine a SteveTony Mamma Mia! AU, where Peter( Tony's son-adoptive or not) is getting married and he finds his dad's old diary,...
body:
Imagine a SteveTony Mamma Mia! AU, where Peter( Tony’s son-adoptive or not) is getting married and he finds his dad’s old diary, and of course he reads through it, and he learns about his dad’s exes from 20 years(or whatever) and he thinks that since he’s getting married his dad would be alone and so he contacts the three and invites them to his wedding.

Like,

Tony in the role of Donna

Peter as Sophie

Steve as Sam

Bucky as Bill

Stephen as Harry

Nat as Tanya

Clint as Rosie

Shuri and Ned as Peter’s best friends

MJ as Sky(or maybe Harley as Sky)

And Donna and the Dynamites would be the Avengers, Tony’s old band, and Black Widow and Hawkeye and IronMan could be stage names.

Just,,,, imagine Tony and Steve singing SOS by Abba.

Aaaa someone write this cuz im illiterate

Steve as Sam

Bucky as Bill

Stephen as Harry

Nat as Tanya

Clint as Rosie

Shuri and Ned as Peter’s best friends

MJ as Sky(or maybe Harley as Sky)

And Donna and the Dynamites would be the Avengers, Tony’s old band, and Black Widow and Hawkeye and IronMan could be stage names.

Just,,,, imagine Tony and Steve singing SOS by Abba.

Aaaa someone write this cuz im illiterate

AU, where Peter( Tony’s son-adoptive or not) is getting married and he finds his dad’s old diary, and of course he reads through it, and he learns about his dad’s exes from 20 years(or whatever) and he thinks that since he’s getting married his dad would be alone and so he contacts the three and invites them to his wedding.

Like,

Tony in the role of Donna

Peter as Sophie

summary: I've expressed my hatred for Steve going back to the past to bone down Peggy because of many reason, but like it's the funniest...
body: I’ve expressed my hatred for Steve going back to the past to bone down Peggy because of many reason, but like it’s the funniest thing when you consider that Steve couldn’t talk to Tony without messing up the time line. Like Peggy is just like “Hey, are you ready to go meet Howard’s son?” And Steve just is like, “Hmmm nope sorry can’t do that,” and his excuses just keep getting wilder and he takes literally EVERY measure to avoid Tony.

summary: “I saw them hold hands for more than five seconds CLINT BARTON--” “You’re the one who insisted to go there, Nat!”  “Don’t even...
caption:
“I saw them hold hands for more than five seconds CLINT BARTON–”

“You’re the one who insisted to go there, Nat!”

“Don’t even get me started with the LOOKS–”

and they ask you how you are, and you just have to say you’re fine when you’re not really fine, because they keep insisting that the 5-second handhold was part of the bro-handshake they made

summary: Peter Parker writes fanfic where Tony is, in fact, still alive, and inserts him into every aspect of his life as Spidey and a...
body: Peter Parker writes fanfic where Tony is, in fact, still alive, and inserts him into every aspect of his life as Spidey and a couple of a [Y/N] fics in first person POV so he can get across his sadness and other emotions and try to cheer himself up sometimes, but he also writes interactions they’ve had in the past and while people dont know it’s him, Peter Parker they do know it’s him Spidey because he posts under the name Spider-Man and also puts links up on his official Twitter which Pepper helped him get verified. occassionally he’ll read them to Morgan but use his name and everything like that, and she asks for them so many times he has perfect recollection of how the tales go, and she laughs every time she hears he thought they were “using their made up names” while on the donut ship

blog.name: theanniewalker
blog.title: Annie Walker
blog.description: An average person with a heart of dreams.

summary: So weekly updates every Friday? Also I have a question for a scenario I’m wondering how your characters would react in. What if...
question: So weekly updates every Friday? Also I have a question for a scenario I’m wondering how your characters would react in. What if while in hiding Peter fathered a child. How would Tony react? I’m curious.
answer:
No, not every Friday. Depends on the editing and such. And the time. I’ll start to have more time to write further down the road, but currently, my work life is eating it up. 

In regards to your scenario, if Peter had a child (and depending on the mother), he would probably stay away. No need to risks the child’s life. He would watch from afar, but keep interactions limited. That way, the child wouldn’t be in danger. Peter would love him or her, but wouldn’t be in the child’s life for the reason he’s a wanted person. 

Now, let’s say the mother was MJ. Then, most likely MJ would go underground with Peter without any complaints (well, besides it being directed at Tony). It wouldn’t be ideal, but for safety and parental relationship, MJ would join Peter underground. They would raise their child in secret to the best of their ability, and do their utmost to protect him/her. Again, not an ideal living situation, but I feel like MJ wouldn’t let Peter just abandon them. She would go with him in hiding. 

You are curious as to how Tony reacts. If Tony discovers Peter has a young family, I believe he would do everything he can to give them security. Yes, he would bring both mother and child to the Tower or Compound (they would probably have apartments at both places), provide whatever it is they need and even hire a bodyguard for them. If Tony saw Peter as a son, then the child would be seen as a grandchild. Tony would visit often, bring gifts and dote on the little one. 

Don’t mistake this as a good thing though. Both mother and child wouldn’t have any choices. They would be forced to move into the Tower and/or Compound. They would have to always have a guard with them, be allowed permission to leave or go anywhere. The mother wouldn’t have a say in the child’s upbringing as much as she would like, which includes education, after-school activities, friends, etc. Tony would have the most say in such matters.

As for Peter, if he found out Tony knew of his child, he would probably try to get his child away. But in case he lost, Peter would have willingly return to the Tower to be with them. Unlike the mother’s case, Peter would have more say in the child’s upbringing because Tony would probably listen to him more so than the mother. Peter would have a better chance in protecting his kid from Tony’s meddling. 

But, again, Peter’s power is limited. For example, Peter wouldn’t have a say in the matter of the child’s doctor. Tony wouldn’t negotiate it as he would want one of his own, trusted doctors (like Dr. Cho) to be the child’s doctor. The reason being is that Tony wants to study the child’s genetics, seeing as Peter’s offspring would be the first baby born to an enhanced individual. Tony would argue that it’s for health purposes and not nefarious control (which is true, I don’t see Tony wanting to study the child’s genetics for evil plans. Just wants to learn so that they could be ready for any problems the child may have), but Peter would have doubts and always be wary with Tony poking and prodding his child. Again, not that Tony did experiments on the child. Just the normal blood, urine and whatever samples doctors ask for patients. 

So, to answer your question in regards to Tony’s reactions, I think he would be thrilled that Peter started a family, but would control their movements and everything in their lives. Tony would see it as keeping them safe and giving them a stable environment, but Peter and the mother (not the child, they wouldn’t know any better) would see it as a hostage situation. 

Hope this satisfies your curiosity. Is it what you thought?

Peter would love him or her, but wouldn’t be in the child’s life for the reason he’s a wanted person. 

Now, let’s say the mother was MJ. Then, most likely MJ would go underground with Peter without any complaints (well, besides it being directed at Tony). It wouldn’t be ideal, but for safety and parental relationship, MJ would join Peter underground. They would raise their child in secret to the best of their ability, and do their utmost to protect him/her. Again, not an ideal living situation, but I feel like MJ wouldn’t let Peter just abandon them. She would go with him in hiding. 

You are curious as to how Tony reacts. If Tony discovers Peter has a young family, I believe he would do everything he can to give them security. Yes, he would bring both mother and child to the Tower or Compound (they would probably have apartments at both places), provide whatever it is they need and even hire a bodyguard for them. If Tony saw Peter as a son, then the child would be seen as a grandchild. Tony would visit often, bring gifts and dote on the little one. 

Don’t mistake this as a good thing though. Both mother and child wouldn’t have any choices. They would be forced to move into the Tower and/or Compound. They would have to always have a guard with them, be allowed permission to leave or go anywhere. The mother wouldn’t have a say in the child’s upbringing as much as she would like, which includes education, after-school activities, friends, etc. Tony would have the most say in such matters.

As for Peter, if he found out Tony knew of his child, he would probably try to get his child away. But in case he lost, Peter would have willingly return to the Tower to be with them. Unlike the mother’s case, Peter would have more say in the child’s upbringing because Tony would probably listen to him more so than the mother. Peter would have a better chance in protecting his kid from Tony’s meddling. 

But, again, Peter’s power is limited. For example, Peter wouldn’t have a say in the matter of the child’s doctor. Tony wouldn’t negotiate it as he would want one of his own, trusted doctors (like Dr. Cho) to be the child’s doctor. The reason being is that Tony wants to study the child’s genetics, seeing as Peter’s offspring would be the first baby born to an enhanced individual. Tony would argue that it’s for health purposes and not nefarious control (which is true, I don’t see Tony wanting to study the child’s genetics for evil plans. Just wants to learn so that they could be ready for any problems the child may have), but Peter would have doubts and always be wary with Tony poking and prodding his child. Again, not that Tony did experiments on the child. Just the normal blood, urine and whatever samples doctors ask for patients. 

So, to answer your question in regards to Tony’s reactions, I think he would be thrilled that Peter started a family, but would control their movements and everything in their lives. Tony would see it as keeping them safe and giving them a stable environment, but Peter and the mother (not the child, they wouldn’t know any better) would see it as a hostage situation. 

Hope this satisfies your curiosity. Is it what you thought?
